sn22.84:3.2: The expected phrase “the Teacher summons him” is absent in Mahāsaṅgīti, but present in PTS.
sn22.84:4.1: The Buddha’s incredible skill in teaching. His encouragement is not mere platitudes; he first draws out Tissa’s actual wisdom, then he praises that.
sn22.84:10.15: This sentence lacks a verb, so we assume homi, “I am”.
